item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, February 27, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: I got laid off from Meta and created a minor hit on Steam (897 points | 208 comments)
2. Winners of the $10k ISBN visualization bounty (253 points | 17 comments)
3. Show HN: Libredesk – Open-source customer support desk. Single binary app (63 points | 9 comments)

5. iMac G4(K) (228 points | 97 comments)
6. DualPipe: Bidirectional pipeline parallelism algorithm (92 points | 14 comments)

8. Launch HN: Maritime Fusion (YC W25) – Fusion Reactors for Ships (176 points | 187 comments)

14. Cross Views (140 points | 107 comments)

24. ForeverVM: Run AI-generated code in stateful sandboxes that run forever (140 points | 42 comments)
25. Show HN: I created a language called AntiLang – breaking all the conventions (88 points | 50 comments)
26. A Comprehensive Formal Security Analysis of OAuth 2.0 (25 points | 2 comments)
27. Long division verified via Hoare logic (82 points | 45 comments)
28. Gambling on papal conclaves (33 points | 17 comments)
29. Rediscovering Quaternions (91 points | 54 comments)
30. Teslas monitor everything – including you [video] from WIRED (8 points | discuss)
